titles.title: Tigertail Historical Tree Island Repatriation Act of 2023
Tigertail Historical Tree Island Repatriation Act of 2023
To realign L-29 at full Federal expense for the Miccosukee Tribe to expand the area for the Tigertail camp, which is a residential area.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary:
Tigertail Historical Tree Island Repatriation Act of 2023
This bill authorizes the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to realign, at full federal expense, a portion of a specified levee in central and southern Florida in order to reconfigure the levee in the vicinity of the Tigertail Camp of the Miccosukee Tribe of Indians.
